#summary About the toolbox

= About the Robotics Toolbox =

The toolbox is based on Matlab code developed by Peter Corke for his [http://eprints.infodiv.unimelb.edu.au/archive/00000547/ PhD research].
A Recent IEEE Robotics & Automation magazine [http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/Xplore/login.jsp?url=/iel5/100/4437736/04437745.pdf?isnumber=4437736&arnumber=4437745   article] (Volume 14, Issue 4, Dec. 2007 Page(s):16 - 17) discusses the toolbox.

Several versions now exist and in different languages

== Matlab ==

The toolbox is available from:
  * [http://www.petercorke.com/Robotics%20Toolbox.html petercorke.com]
  * [http://www.ict.csiro.au/downloads/robotics CSIRO]
